participant_1.background:
I help people in the hospital during the week and pretend to be a medieval knight in the forest on the weekends.
I don't let my busy schedule get in the way of my relationships with others.
mom in telecommunications.
I stay away from clowns and eat my favorite blue jello.
my best friend is from tanzania.

Jasper may be jealous of my new Chevy.
i enjoy crosswords , crocheting , and football.
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
my grandmother lives in my guesthouse.

content.text: My name is participant_1. What is yours?
My name is participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to crochet, do crossword puzzles, and watch football.
That sounds fun. I like to read, play video games, and go to the gym.
What do you like to read?
I like to read fantasy novels, science fiction novels, and historical fiction.
Those sound like fun books. I like to read romance novels.
I've never read a romance novel before. What are they like?
They are usually about a woman who falls in love with a man.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check one out sometime.
You should! They are really great.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too. Have a great day!
